successes.title: B-Sieged: Sons of the Abyss
successes.description: A cooperative castle defense board game with 70 miniatures, where mighty Heroes have to withstand the siege of an Abyssal horde!

Pledges.description: Defender Early Bird! - B-Sieged: Sons of the Abyss core game + exclusive Hero Thorlak, the Barbarian + All unlocked stretch goals! *Shipping charged after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
